document_data.mainbody:
SalhantarThe map included in The Shining South (1993) has this mislabeled as Salhantaz. was a small town located in the nation of Halruaa during the 14 century DR.
Salhantar was located in central Halruaa just south of an arm of the Nathaghal Mountains. The town sat on the eastern shore of the River Aluar north of Aluarim.
